body.para: There is a use case that sort of sucks when you don't force the user to authenticate each time, and thats when a your application supports multiple twitter accounts. Its nice to shortcut authenticating because it removes a step for the end user, but it sucks when you are trying to associate with multiple accounts.

It would be nice if we could pass a flag to force login to show, or pass in an expected username and if its not the same as what twitter has for their session cookie, it invalidates and forces a login or something.
Not sure if something like this exists already or anyone has ran into this issue and figured out a work around.
